html: 11.2.24  9:54 am   i heard you are working on a bunch of videos right now. i'm super excited for them. my question is, i remember you saying before that you wouldn't make an album because you preferred to make one song at a time and then release it right when it's done. what's the reason you're working on a bunch of things (videos instead of songs i guess) at once this time?
